Designer Studio

PDF Block Template
Creating Group Blocks

2 min
this feature is used to group the blocks of pdf block template the group appears as a collapsible menu on the front end to the end customer how to add group blocks? how to add group blocks? in manage blocks, page click on group blocks button (top right corner) click on ‘add’ button enter the group name select the blocks to add in the group click on ‘save’
